channel.title: Wtf, my soccer field has hills?
channel.description: I AM NOT EVEN JOKING! Ok, today i had a soccer game, so were not the home team (vistors) and their field had a hudge slant, you could sled down it and it would go fast. IT WASNT EVEN FUNNY. I was like, wtf?

item.title: Wtf, my soccer field has hills?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“jason_x, post:39, topic:141921”][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=194280.msg1751053#msg1751053 date=1189593559]
LOL?!?!??!! You’re not a pussy because you skate? Oman that’s funny.

Ok seriously No point in football as Americans call it its no fun climbing and making physical contact with other men like that its not right. Then why don’t you try to play some soccer and see how much more endurance you need compared to football. I played backyard football the other day and the kids were on steroids…No disrespect towards rugby since its rarely seen anymore by the mass public, and if you gonna get mad at me don’t say I’m a pussie and everything else because I skateboard’ play soccer, and occasionally play a game of backyard football mind not often so I know what pain is.

Big difference when you play it seriously. And no, you do not know what pain is. Believe me.
[/quote]

Ever fall 6 feet and land on your foot sideways break 3 toes and fracture your foot? ever fall into a sideways scorpian and hear your spine crack ?? didnt think so.[/quote]
I’ve had a lot worse, but I shall not name them as I am starting to make it look like I’m boasting about injuries, which I am not. So I’ll leave it there. Oh, and heard your spine crack? I think if you ask Pookey71 he’ll tell you about my injury with my back. If he remembers that is.

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf, my soccer field has hills?
item.dc:creator: @m102391 m102391
item.description:
@m102391 wrote:

[quote=“CopyRight, post:7, topic:141921”]http://farm1.static.flickr.com/218/464581291_b1875cdfc1.jpg

ROFL[/quote]
roflmfao
idk why, lol[br][size=1]Posted on: September 11, 2007, 02:52:22 PM[/size][hr][quote=“killerman93, post:12, topic:141921”][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=194280.msg1745863#msg1745863 date=1189431485]
Soccer is gay tbh. Where’s the contact?!
[/quote]

American football is gay, “I need 10 layers of padding, a helmet and steroids.”
Rugby is a good sport, so is english football and basketball.
All others are shit (except cricket).[/quote]
you shut up. and go back to austrailia or whatever the last gay country in the world that still plays that[quote=“OnlyOneRule, post:14, topic:141921”]of course its got hills (not reall hils… just bumps), if its just the start of the season and the feild hasnt been used for a while, the reain will have forced it to become a little bit un even… you guys should be training on it to flatten it… especially in the rain[/quote]
wtf, do you even knwo what ur talking about? i dont think stompoing on the ground during a rain storm will change it…[br][size=1]Posted on: September 11, 2007, 02:55:41 PM[/size][hr][quote=“sicarius99, post:27, topic:141921”][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=194280.msg1748681#msg1748681 date=1189507376]
You’re right, there’s wearing 10 layers of padding and a helmet.
[/quote]

only on your legs you only have to wear shoulder pads on your chest[/quote]
no, because then they would be called CHEST pads

Read full topic
item.source: Wtf, my soccer field has hills?

item.title: Wtf, my soccer field has hills?
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:19, topic:141921”][quote author=ThAt0n36Uy link=topic=194280.msg1746949#msg1746949 date=1189475794]
If you’re implying that American football is homosexual, then you’re ignorant. A player has to be comfortable with their own manhood to pat another man on the ass. And don’t exaggerate the amount of padding needed to keep yourself from being murdered on the field. Without that padding, easily 2 people could die a game. And no one said they use steroids, if they did, they would be removed from the NFL, NCAA, or High School Football. Other than the steroids taken to heal injuries. Why don’t you get off your ass one day and go outside and see what American Football is really like, rather than forming an opinion based on what your friend might tell you.
[/quote]

Have you seen rugby? They do exactly the same thing but without padding and only a mouth guard.[/quote]
why a mouth guard? British people’s teeth cant get any worse

Read full topic
